name: Relativity Wars: Space RTS with Science!
name_original: Relativity Wars: Space RTS with Science!
description:
Relativity Wars is a god-type strategy game, set in a universe which obeys Einstein’s theories of relativity! You will be exploring the universe, commanding fleets and deploying weapons that bend the very fabric of space and time.

In Relativity Wars you play a God commanding a civilisation as they begin to explore the universe. Guide your charges in epic real time space battles against the Squishian menace!
Start your campaign today, you'll conquer the universe before you know it, and you might even learn a bit of science!
